title: PM Shehbaz Sharif highly appreciates security forces for killing five Khawarij terrorists
content:
LAHORE, Jan 19 (APP):Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Sunday highly appreciated security forces for carrying out successful action against ‘Fitna-al-Khawarij’
terrorists in district Zhob at Pak-Afghan Border.
The premier paid tribute to the security forces for killing five ‘Khawarij’
Terrorists were trying to enter Pakistan from across the border.
Brave forces of Pakistan were standing like a rock to protect borders, Shehbaz Sharif said and added that entire nation was also standing with the security forces in war against terrorism.
Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif said: “We are fully determined to root
out all types of terrorism from the country.”
